summary: In addition to their role in education, public schools serve as voting locations, emergency shelters, and more. But can people with disabilities access all public school buildings? Our national survey found two-thirds of school districts had facilities with physical barriers that may limit access. For example, steep ramps at school entrances can make it hard for people with disabilities to get in. The Departments of...
title: K-12 Education: School Districts Need Better Information to Help Improve Access for People with Disabilities
